reviews.review: A game I have fun returning with my brother with.
Have been playing this game since 2007. Absolutely love the gameplay and multiplayer scenarios
Ну просто топчик, просто вспомнить старые добрые школьные дни=))
jogo foda , recomendo muito. eu amo esse jogo , vale a pena comprar
ชอบภาคนี้ที่สุดละ มีอัปเดทภาพด้วย ชอบตัวประกันที่สุดละ สมจริง ไม่แข็งเหมือนก้อนหิน
Эта игра пережила свое, но она останется у всех в сердцах.

Taková oddechovka, která se dá rychle dohrát. Odlišné csko od ostatních.

Different from other cs games little and some short singleplayer missions good for killing time.
A great experience different from all other Counter Strike games. The bots won't team kill you.
A beautiful masterpiece, it truly brings a tear to my eye. An absolute labor of love.
Bütün valve oyunlarından uzak durmanızı tavsiye ederim akıl sağlığınız için.

-"¿Dónde está el gring0?"

-"No lo sé. No lo sé".

-"Sigue buscando".

-"I have a surprise for him, but he won't like it".

-Couple of Colombian Guerrilla Warfare troops.

I'm totally aprrove this game!
Shut up and take my money :)
Самая классная игра детства, советую всем купить на каникулы, вспомнить, понастольгировать за 25 рублей вообще самое то!
It keeps my young cousin busy
一直闪退，根本玩不了，还不能退费！
Good way to practice your aim. Fun to play with AI.
trop puissant depuis des dizaines d'année déja
jeu très connu et fidèle a ses bases, très bon jeu pour passer du bon temps
Basically 1.6 but for people who like playing offline with bots

rageant de ouf (3 claviers cassés sur l'echelle de Sardoche)
Dur a jouer mais satisfaisant quand on fini les levels
realmente ver este juegazo con nuevos graficos me trae mucha nostalgia de cuando era niño e iba al ciber a jugarlo, es bello y perfecto.
muito bom, pena que tem muito adm de merda

Bueno lo compramos con un amigo solo para que podieramos jugar juntos en un servidor dedicado solo nosotros , pero lamentablemente no lo podemos conseguir ,,cuando intento a unirme a la partida de mi amigo me dice que el servidor no responde ,,Tengo que hacer algo mas  ? Que debemos hacer para poder jugar solo nosotros  ? si no se puede nos gustaria devolverlo Espero que me ayuden Gracias
Menos bugs , em relação ao  1.6 , menos hacker players porem , a adaptação do 1.6 para o condition Zero vai demorar um pouco

Are you a *cod fanboy?
Do you enjoy eating toothpaste straight out of the tube?
Have you tried to eat plywood without cooking it?






yep




*cod = i meant the type of fish you dumnaas
very good game, but its underrated
Although there is lots of criticism about this game, it is still an amazing improvement over CS 1.6 and has a nice Singleplayer campaign. A solid game that I played a lot during my childhood.
I haven't played so many games, but this is the best first shooter experience I've ever had.
一开始还能正常玩，这两天倒好上去就显示有问题，根本就没法玩
very exciting would like to see a section for less experienced players
la bonne époque de valve ! tout simplement

Timeless classic LAN party memories. 
10/10 will play again.
Anlatmaya gerek yok çocukluğumun oyunlarından biriydi. Hala o eski tadını vermeyi de başarıyor.

Condition Zero to starsza część gry Counter Strike, przez wielu uważana za tę najgorszą. Według mnie tak nie jest, mimo wielu głupich błędów w silniku gry podczas jej tworzenia. Gra jest spoko, misje potrafią zaciekawić na te 10-15 minut, a jeśli znudzi wam się chodzenie z botami i odbijanie site'u to zawsze można przenieść się na CS:CZ Deleted Scenes, gdzie mamy już do czynienia z pół fabularnymi misjami z ciekawymi lokacjami - trwającymi każda około 0.5h (oczywiście grafika nie jest powalająca, boty nie są najlepsze aimowo, ale nostalgia to zawsze nostalgia :)
Dzięki za przeczytanie, jeśli spodobała ci się moja opinia to reakcja pod nią mile widziana :D
nicht so oft gespielt, aber macht spaß
you can shoot gun and call other people names. great gameplay
FUN GAME, This game is CS 1.6 but you have a campaign and you can add bots in multiplayer.
游戏太难了，困难难度的第四关打好几个小时没打过去
classic is king, no need to think too much, just play , just shoot.... Counter-strike condition zero CSZ make me fun.
это класссная игра если тыпытаешься убить время. Но встречаются и баги когда ты пытаешься вывести заложников,а они застревают в мтенах или не могут пройти через дверь

A fun miltiplayer shooter with a nice single player mode
the mechanics are nice and robust with the only difficulty being my own skill (which is awful btw)
and the bots are nice and responsive for that single player action

although it has became obsolete by CS:GO because CS:GO is free to play and has substantially better mechanics, CS:GO on the other hand has worse single player content while the multiplayer mode is better supported.

If you're looking for a single player CS experience, buy this game or CounterStrike Source

Aún recuerdo cuando era pequeño y me pasaba horas y horas jugando a este juego en la casa de mi primo o en alguna cabina de Internet, me causa mucha nostalgia volver a jugarlo! :'D muy buenos tiempos!
进游戏无限原地转圈，动不了，百度也百度不到问题，还是回去玩go了。。。
Quase 3k/h de jogo.. se eu não gostasse porrrrrrrrrra....
